scripts.build_test-ts-esmodule: cd services/testTsEsModule && npx tsc && cp package.json ./dist && cd ../..
scripts.build_test-ts-commonjs: cd services/testTsCommonJs && npx tsc && cp package.json ./dist && cd ../..
scripts.build: npm run build_test-ts-esmodule && npm run build_test-ts-commonjs
scripts.deploy: npm run build && tofu apply -auto-approve && tofu output -json > opentofu-outputs.json
